abstract: Trial of Owen Labrie, graduate of St Paul's in Concord, NH, concludes; verdict finds him not guilty of rape, but guilty of multiple misdemeanor charges including sex with a minor, endangering the welfare of a child, and felony charge involving use of technology to lure a minor; sentencing is scheduled for late October.
lead_paragraph: The verdict came after a trial revealed the backslapping sexual culture among some students at one of the nation’s most exclusive boarding schools.

headline.main: Owen Labrie of St. Paul’s School Is Found Not Guilty of Main Rape Charge
headline.print_headline: Acquittal on Most Serious Charges in Rape Case; Guilty on Lesser Charges

snippet: The verdict came after a trial revealed the backslapping sexual culture among some students at one of the nation’s most exclusive boarding schools.
